title: React Portfolio
description: This is my personal portfolio website. It is built using React and styled with Material-UI. It is a single page application that showcases my projects, skills, and contact information.

title: RentEase
description: A full-stack application using Python and MERN stack to facilitate smooth interactions between homeowners and homebuyers.

title: Note Ease
description: AI driven note taking application utilizing Google Cloud Speech-To-Text API and TensorFLow to generate real-time transcription, creating an immersive note taking experience through hand gesture formatting

title: Nomore 404
role: Full Stack Developer and AI Integration
description: AI powered platform build with Streamlit, PostgreSQL, and Cohere AI providing an algorithm analysis solution for developers Job Search

title: 3udoku-shuffle
description: A website for game dev startup team size of 3 where they've created a unique version of 3 way sudoku

title: Mealer: Food Delivery
description: Developed a food delivery app in Android Studio using Java, ensuring seamless user experience for both restaurant owners and customers

title: Sakura Sound
description: Sakura Sound a webpage dedicated to 4 artists of my choosing, One Ok Rock, Blue Encount, Survive Said the Prophet, and MY FIRST STORY

title: Syntax Sisters
description: Computer Project Class application developed by a team of 6 aspiring CS undergrad students. A cross-platform calendar app built with Python and Flet

title: CareMate
description: AI-powered health and wellness companion designed to support seniors in their daily lives so they stay active and independent!

title: EcoGrocer
description: EcoGrocer helps combat the overall goal of reducing food wastage while also providing a secondary solution of helping the homeless by directing app users to possible food bank locations nearby (in hopes of donating non-perishable foods).

title: Focus Flow: GenAI Application
description: A full-stack webapp empowered by the state-of-the-art AI model which is able to give you a reminder to take a break essentially when you are stressed or down

title: Startup Connect
description: StartupConnect is a full-stack networking and recommendation platform tailored for early-stage startups and VC firms. It combines the power of community, AI-driven insights, gamification, and mental health support — all while helping startups improve investor appeal and VCs discover the most aligned opportunities.

title: Stack Sketch
description: Empower every software team to build smarter, faster, and more cost-efficient cloud infrastructure—automated, optimized, and monetized.
